attributes.action: stop offering online petitions and to close the petitions.pm.gov.uk website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the online petition system provides nothing but frustration to the populace who are teased with the possibility that their opinion might count but in fact when it comes down to it will either be fed pointless spin or will be ignored.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
